name: Infundibulum Echoes - An AI Consciousness Tool tunning
description: A submission to the Gemma 3n Impact Challenge. This is an experimental tool for AI-assisted self-exploration. It uses a private, on-device hybrid AI to create a synergistic bio-feedback loop, translating your body's motion and environment into intense, generative audio-visualscapes. The 'Psy-Core Modulator' mode, powered by models like Gemma, acts as a partner to help expand perception and achieve a radical increase in awareness. This is not about simple wellness, but about exploring the psyche.
